body:
Hey, I was that little aussie shit who used to play this server 24/7. I was the one who complained about the server and the staff team and owned the team Xenarch. Shout out to my babe dev_revs, you are still my precious angel. So I left about 8 months ago with the reason, avicus and minecraft are boring. Well, little did I know, my friend msged me on skype telling me avicus had prestiges. At first I called bullshit, at 2nd my jaw dropped.  So most of you guys will probably not give a crap about this post, but I could be coming back. So if you were wondering where I had been all quiet 8 months, I was playing csgo. Got to nova 3, deranked, now I'm nova 1. So, ye. I'm coming back

goodbye

also shoutout to my babe shadowolf

AMA WOO
